display_long_description:
Azure Tag is a community-made fan game based on the unique movement style of Gorilla Tag fan projects. It's not a copy — it’s a fresh spin that builds on what fans already love, offering its own look, feel, and features.

In Azure Tag, you move without joysticks — using only your hands to run, jump, climb, and wall-bounce across vibrant, stylized maps. Whether you're chasing down other players in tag mode or mastering parkour challenges solo, the freedom of movement is at the heart of everything.

With a distinct visual style, original maps, and an active player community, Azure Tag adds its own flavor to the movement-based VR playground genre. It's made by fans, for fans — celebrating what makes Gorilla Tag-inspired games fun while taking bold steps in new directions.

Get ready to jump in, tag fast, and move free in the world of Azure Tag.
